s: Not a major issue, but technically they shorted me 450grams of salt thereby overcharging me $3.00 for the merchandise that I received. Since it would cost me twice that much to return the shipment, I will keep what I received; but next time I will use another vender other than Diamond Crystal ...

t: What Happened to Diamond Crystal Kosher Salt? - The New York Times
s: August 1, 2023 - To entice new customers, Diamond Crystal recently introduced a redesigned box in a smaller size. The new one-pound box sells for $8.99 on Amazon.
